transcript: Replace with the spoken content of the video (from Whisper or typed). Example: First I will cover the main points, then we will look at delivery. The speaker maintained strong eye contact and used clear gestures.
video_notes: Replace with a description of nonverbal/verbal behaviors you want the model to learn. Example: Strong eye contact with camera throughout. Relaxed, open posture. Purposeful hand gestures. Steady pacing with appropriate pauses. Minimal use of notes.

transcript: Second example: minimal transcript if the video is mostly nonverbal.
video_notes: Example of needs-improvement delivery: limited eye contact, read from notes often, stiff posture, few gestures. Use this to teach the model to score lower for these behaviors.
